revised_title: Distinguishing Genera of Shells and Anomalies in Mollusca Habitations
tldr: The author discusses the difficulty in distinguishing certain genera of shells, particularly between Patella and Lottia. He also highlights anomalies in the habitats of various species of mollusks, such as living in different environments like land, fresh, and saltwater. This study contributes to the understanding of shell classification and mollusca biology.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Zoology > Malacology
